      • receive

        public void receive​(Email[] emails)
        Parameters:
        emails - - newly arrived Emails This method should store the Emails in emails in this SpamFilter. O(n^2)

      • filter

        public java.lang.String filter()
        Returns:
        - the ID of emails that are filtered out by the threshold This should remove all Emails that are stored in this SpamFilter that have spam scores greater than or equal to this SpamFilterâ€™s threshold value. O(n)

      • train

        public void train​(Email[] emails,
                  boolean[] isSpam)
        Parameters:
        emails - - emails that are labeled spam or not
        isSpam - - the spam boolean of these emails This method passes this SpamFilter a set of Emails that have been labelled as spam or not. And provide spam analyze for later spam decider. O(n^3)
